list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat(agent): add browser tools, safety checks, and OpenAI provider
Introduce the plan/act/observe orchestrator with memory, logging, and recovery strategies. Add tool registry plus DOM query, screenshot, and action tools with security policy confirmation. Implement OpenAI provider alongside Anthropic and add text/time utilities and selector generation.

task.summary:
chore(idea): align IDE config with local environment
Exclude .venv from the module content root and switch from inherited JDK to the Python 3.12 (AIgent) SDK. Also update workspace settings (auto-import reload, Git root detection, and IDE properties).

feat(agent): add browser tools, safety checks, and OpenAI provider
Introduce the plan/act/observe orchestrator with memory, logging, and recovery strategies. Add tool registry plus DOM query, screenshot, and action tools with security policy confirmation. Implement OpenAI provider alongside Anthropic and add text/time utilities and selector generation.
